Nightlight:


Nightlight was sat down outside base enjoying the sun and fresh air 
when she receives Rodimus' com link "Hi my love" she replied "I'm 
outside... do you need something?"






--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus returns to base. After looking around a bit he finds Kup 
and Magnus. Before he says anything he activates his comm.
> 
> Rodimus Prime(over comm): Nightlight, honey, where are you?
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Kup, Ultra Magnus, I have a small briefing to give 
in a moment. Anything I should know about?
> 
> 
> : : Kup : :
> 
> Kup looks to Magnus to explain about the possible evil Optimus.
